short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get more done with the Webpage Timer extension. Easily set a timer for any site and receive a notification when it's up. Try it now!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Webpage Timer is a simple but powerful tool that helps you stay focused and organized while browsing the web. With it, you can easily set a timer for any webpage and receive a notification when the time is up. This is a great way to stay on track and avoid getting distracted by the endless possibilities of the internet. Plus, the extension is lightweight, easy to use, and completely free. Whether you're working, studying, or just looking to be more productive, the Webpage Timer can help you achieve your goals. Give it a try today and see how it can improve your productivity!
